tool.name: SAGA.pointcloud_tools.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS True output_data_CUT $output_data_CUT name SAGA.pointcloud_tools.0 POINTS $POINTS AREA $AREA INVERSE $INVERSE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CUT $OutputSection_CUT.outputType_CUT transmissionMode_CUT $OutputSection_CUT.transmissionMode_CUT

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: One or several input point cloud datasets to cut. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-lasf

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool allows one to extract subsets from one or several point cloud datasets. The area-of-interest is defined either by bounding box coordinates, the extent of a grid system or a shapes layer, or by polygons of a shapes layer. Note that the latter does not support the inverse selection in case the shapes layer contains more than one polygon.<br/>In case a polygon shapes layer is used and one or more polygons are selected, only the selected polygons are processed.
